backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining booking, provider, rental, and user profile types with map‑based state and access‑controlled profile queries and updates.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking feature requests to affected frontend files and components with confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing key frontend pages, components, and updated logo usage.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind layer defining CSS variables for light/dark themes and applying base background and border styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the application layout and configures all routes for services, bookings, rentals, and provider pages.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Card-based access denied screen with an alert icon and navigation back to home.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading states and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireLogi: Wrapper enforcing authentication and showing a login prompt when the user is not signed in.
frontend/src/components/bookings/Booking: Renders a status badge mapped from backend booking statuses to label and variant styles.
Displays the new Eyegic logo asset with size variants and non-shrinking layout behavior.
frontend/src/components/forms/OptionalPh: Optional photo upload component with preview, removal, and callback support.
frontend/src/components/layout/PageLayou: A layout wrapper that renders page content with optional title and description and configurable max-width classes.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Displays the site footer with navigation links, company info, and a dynamic copyright line.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Renders the responsive site header with navigation links, login controls, and a mobile menu sheet.
frontend/src/hooks/bookings/useBooking.t: Fetches a single booking by ID using the actor and react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/bookings/useCreateOpt: Mutation hook to create an optician booking and invalidate customer bookings afterward.
frontend/src/hooks/bookings/useCreateRen: Mutation hook to create a rental booking and refresh customer bookings on success.
frontend/src/hooks/bookings/useCreateRep: Mutation hook that submits a repair booking and invalidates customer bookings.
frontend/src/hooks/bookings/useCustomerB: Retrieves all customer bookings via the actor with react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/bookings/useProviderB: Loads bookings assigned to a provider using react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/bookings/useUpdateBoo: Mutation hook to update a booking’s status and invalidate related booking queries.
Fetches provider details tied to the current identity and provides a mutation to onboard new providers.
frontend/src/hooks/rentals/useRentalCata: Retrieves the rental item catalog through the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on identity, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth state, login handling, and stored identity restoration via a context provider.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, theme variables, dark mode tokens, and custom layout utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React, sets up QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider, and renders the app.
frontend/src/pages/bookings/BookingDetai: Displays detailed information for a specific booking, including type, status, address, time, and related metadata.
frontend/src/pages/bookings/mobile-optic: Shows confirmation details for a mobile optician booking, including service info, address, time, and total price.
Form for creating a mobile optician booking with service selection, address, preferred time, and price calculation.
frontend/src/pages/bookings/MyBookingsPa: Lists all bookings for the logged‑in customer with status, schedule, and navigation to detail pages.
frontend/src/pages/bookings/rentals/Rent: Displays confirmation details for an eyewear rental booking including rental info, delivery address, and payment breakdown.
Handles rental booking creation, including form inputs for days and address, price calculation, and submission via createRentalBooking.
frontend/src/pages/bookings/repairs/Repa: Displays repair booking confirmation with booking details, status, and navigation options.
Form for submitting a repair request, collecting issue details, address, time, optional photo, and sending createRepairBooking.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page showing hero content, service cards, and steps explaining how the eyewear services work.
frontend/src/pages/provider/ProviderDash: Provider dashboard showing provider profile, bookings list, and ability to update booking status.
frontend/src/pages/provider/ProviderOnbo: Form for providers to register by entering personal info, service areas, and offered services.
frontend/src/pages/rentals/RentalItemDet: Shows rental item details, pricing, availability, and navigation to the rental catalog.
frontend/src/pages/rentals/RentalsCatalo: Renders a rental catalog page with search and category filtering, listing items fetched from useRentalCatalog. Displays item availability and navigates to item details.
frontend/src/pages/services/MobileOptici: Shows the mobile optician service overview with features, imagery, and a button to book the service. Includes supporting feature cards.
Presents an overview of the eyewear rentals service with benefits, imagery, and a link to browse the rental catalog. Includes highlight cards for delivery, selection, and returns.
Displays eyewear repair services with a list of service options, imagery, and a button to request repairs. Includes cards highlighting convenience, speed, and expertise.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing them from the URL or storage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, animations, container settings, and plugin integrations for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines project state, architecture notes, known UI issues, required images, and existing features for the Eyegic on‑demand eyewear marketplace. Serves as a fix request outlining logo, hero layout, and rentals tab problems.
